embed.description:
**RealSchim** masterpieces enter the room
 Among our community, 1 lucky member will receive a **[Clay Molandak](https://magiceden.io/item-details/monad-testnet/0x1ea72dcf86c95597360879ed589c175f9a655a30/329)** and 2 members will each receive 50 $MON
— [check out the announcement on X](https://x.com/monad_bandit/status/1917156980424167723).

🔗 Don't forget to save your wallet : **`/savewallet <your-address>`**.

> _“Art meets heist.”_
